welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oderzo, a charming city in Italy known for its rich history and vibrant culture. Take a stroll through our beautiful streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in the local way of life. We hope you have a wonderful stay and enjoy all that Oderzo has to offer!"

terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
